title: Olay Regenerist Microdermabrasion & Peel System 1 Kit
description: Studies have shown regular microdermabrasion is more beneficial to your skin than sporadic treatments. That's why Olay skincare experts developed Regenerist Microdermabrasion & Peel System. Olay combines the power of microdermabrasion with a mini-peel treatment to wake up tired-looking skin. Over time, it visibly improves skin tone and diminishes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.Make it part of your regular skincare regimen to gently resurface your skin's texture and activate surface cell renewal for soft, smooth skin. Its even gentle enough to use up to two times a week.There's only one Regenerist, backed by 60 years of Olay skincare experience. If you're ready for a dramatic transformation, Olay Regenerist Microdermabrasion & Peel System offers you the power of a microdermabrasian and mini-peel treatment to regenerate your skin's appearance in the comfort and convenience of your own home. Olay innovation.. it's a beautiful thing.

title: Bed Head Deep Waver
description: Want frizz-free, bouncy waves that last all day and night, then you will love bed head's 3/4 inch tourmaline ceramic deep waver. tourmaline technology leaves you with frizz-free shiny styles. ceramic technology provides high, even heat that penetrates hair from the inside-out, helping hair retain natural moisture for “frizz-free” styles.

title: NYX Round Case Lipstick Lip Cream 595 Strawberry Milk
description: NYX Cosmetics Round Lipstick Lip Cream 595 Strawberry Milk.  A velvet-textured lipstick formulated with mineral oils to provide moisturizing benefits and rich colors.   NYX's top selling lipstick, the Round Lipstick offers long-lasting, non-smudging color.
